alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 9:03PM CDT until September 23 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LINCOLN COUNTY... At 903 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tryon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Stroud, Davenport, Carney, Tryon, Agra, Kendrick, Avery, and Parkland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
